articles.title: Trial Operation of Subway Train Conducted with Kim Jong Un on Board
articles.content:
Trial Operation of Subway Train Conducted with Kim Jong Un on Board
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- A trial operation of the newly manufactured subway train was conducted with Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, on board. 
					 He arrived at Kaeson Station of the Pyongyang Metro where the trial operation was to be conducted at 22:30 on Thursday.
					
					 Going round the station, he said he missed President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il that day more than ever before, adding that the Pyongyang Metro was a precious treasure of the nation and a grand monumental structure as it was associated with the loving care shown by them for the people all their lives to provide the people with conditions for a more bountiful and civilized life.
					
					 He noted how happy they would have been to see the subway train made by our workers, scientists and technicians run.
					
					 He shuttled from Kaeson Station to Thongil, Sungri, Ponghwa and Yonggwang stations by the subway train to learn in detail about its trial operation.
					
					 The performance of the subway train is very good, he said, adding that its speed is satisfactory and brake works flawlessly.
					
					 The subway train looks fashionable and fittings and operation information appliances also meet the modern requirements, he said. He noted that people would like very well traveling by the subway train made by Koreans with the indigenous technology.
					
					 Our heroic and resourceful Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's working class, scientists and technicians boundlessly faithful to the Party proved in practice,  not with words, that the words "proclivity to import" should be eliminated from people's minds through the successful trial operation, he stressed, adding that this encouraged him more than anything else.
					
					 He had a photo session with officials, scientists and technicians of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex and the relevant field who participated in the trial operation.
					
					 He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled to better spruce up the Pyongyang Metro to meet the requirements of a highly civilized socialist nation and put the metro management and operation on a higher modern and IT basis.
					
					 He was accompanied by Pak Pong Ju, Kim Yang Gon, O Su Yong, Jo Yong Won and Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Sends Notice to Ministry of Unification of S. Korea
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Sends Notice to Ministry of Unification of S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Friday sent a notice to the Ministry of Unification of south Korea through Panmunjom, proposing to hold working-level contact for the talks between authorities of the north and the south of Korea at the Thongil House in the north side of Panmunjom on November 26.

articles.title: Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at Kim Il Sung University of Politics
articles.content:
Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at Kim Il Sung University of Politics
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were erected at Kim Il Sung University of Politics.
					 The statues were unveiled with due ceremony on November 20.
					
					 Present at the unveiling ceremony were commanding officers of the Korean People's Army (KPA) including Pak Yong Sik and Ri Yong Gil, officials, teaching staff and cadets of the university, officials of the military academies at all levels, officers and men of the KPA and others.
					
					 Leading officials of the army and university unveiled the statues.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of supreme leader Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues.
					
					 Laid there were a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK National Defence Commission, floral baskets in the name of Kim Il Sung University of Politics and floral baskets in the name of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, General Staff of the KPA, KPA units and military academies at all levels, different bodies, faculties and departments of the university.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before the statues.
					
					 Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, in his address called for upholding Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for all ages as the eternal leaders of the WPK and the revolution and defending, preserving and glorifying their exploits for the military education.
					
					 Being briefed on the statues, the participants went round them at the end of the ceremony.

articles.title: Fourth Meeting of Frontrankers of Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement Opens
articles.content:
Fourth Meeting of Frontrankers of Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement Opens
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The fourth meeting of the frontrankers of the Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement opened in Pyongyang Friday.
					 The meeting will review the achievements and the experience gained in the movement and discuss tasks and ways for developing the movement onto a new higher stage in all fields and units.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and other senior officials of the party and the state and chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the Workers' Party of Korea, frontrankers of the units which won the three-revolution red flag, merited persons in the Songun era and officials of the relevant fields. 
					
					 Officials of the units which won the three-revolution red flag including industrial establishments and farms in Pyongyang and exemplary three-revolution frontrankers attended the meeting as observers.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C. the WPK and  premier of the Cabinet, delivered a historic letter "Let Us Bring About a Fundamental Turn in the Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement in Line with the Demands of the Developing Revolution" sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un to the participants in the meeting.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C. the WPK, made a report.
					
					 He said that the three-revolution red flag movement that successfully carried forward the history and tradition of the Juche-oriented mass movement has powerfully propelled the revolution and construction, fully demonstrating its attraction and vitality under the guidance of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu over the past four decades.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung initiated mass movements such as the general ideological mobilization movement for nation building and the Chollima movement at each turning point of the revolution and led the revolution and construction along the only road of victory by giving full play to the indomitable mental spirit and tremendous creative energy of the Korean people, he noted, and went on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il who perfectly embodied the President's mode of leading the mass movement initiated a mass movement for winning the three-revolution red flag in November Juche 64 (1975) and saw to it that the workers of Komdok and agricultural workers of Chongsan-ri held its torch before others.
					
					 In November 1986 Kim Jong Il made sure that the first meeting of the frontrankers of the Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement was held and he sent a historic letter "Let Us Step Up Three Revolution Red Flag Movement" to it, clearly indicating the orientation and ways for dynamically waging the movement in an extensive and profound way as required by the developing revolution.
					
					 The undying revolutionary feats performed by Kim Jong Il in the history of the Three-Revolution Red Fag Movement are being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un is opening up a new chapter of the movement, holding fast to the line of the three revolutions -ideological, technological and cultural- as an eternal signpost for winning the final victory of the Korean revolution. 
					
					 It is the lifeline to be invariably held fast to in the movement to firmly defend and further glorify the undying leadership exploits performed by the great leaders in the history of the Juche-oriented mass movement. 
					
					 All fields and units should regard the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as important guidelines and confidently orient the movement into the work for realizing them and thus, translate the behests and desire of the great leaders into reality. 
					
					 The reporter called upon all the party organizations and officials and three-revolution frontrankers to bring about a fundamental turn in the movement and continue making uninterrupted innovations and advances in the drive for building a thriving nation and bringing earlier the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, in hearty response to the historic letter Kim Jong Un sent to the participants in the meeting. 
					
					 Speeches were made. 
					
					 The meeting goes on.

articles.title: MOU Concluded
articles.content:
MOU Concluded
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of OAV, Germany headed by Executive Member of Board Timo Prekop visited Pyongyang, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea between October 24 and 30. 
					 During its stay the delegation visited the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory, Hungnam Industrial Zone and several factories and enterprises in Hamhung. Meetings were held with various companies covering sectors like agriculture, food processing, textile, education, science and technology. 
					
					 A Memorandum of Understanding was signed between Korea Foreign Investment and Economic Cooperation Committee and OAV as an effort to foster business exchange among DPRK and German companies and to develop mutual economic cooperation.

articles.title: Equatorial Guinean Party Leader on Developing Friendly and Cooperative Relations with WPK
articles.content:
Equatorial Guinean Party Leader on Developing Friendly and Cooperative Relations with WPK
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Jeronimo Osa Osa Ecoro, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, expressed deep gratitude to the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea for sending a congratulatory message to the third national special congress of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea and confirmed that he would strive to further develop the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties.
					 He met DPRK Ambassador to the country Kwak Ji Hwan on Nov. 10.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) - Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Hwang Chang Bong, a female centenarian living in neighborhood No. 60, Inhung-dong No. 1, Moranbong District, Pyongyang.
					 Hwang was subject to the Japanese imperialists' all sorts of maltreatment and insult. She came to lead a worthy life only after President Kim Il Sung liberated the country.
					
					 She had dedicated herself to the work of the women's union for decades. She brought up her children so well that they are rendering devoted services at the posts for defending the country and in the field of science and technology.
					
					 She always has balanced diet. She is keeping herself optimistic, doing needlework and simple household chores.

articles.title: Friendship Delegation of Ulan Bator City of Mongolia Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Friendship Delegation of Ulan Bator City of Mongolia Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- A friendship delegation of Ulan Bator City of Mongolia led by Erdene Bat-Uul, governor and mayor of the city, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday.
					 Members of the delegation laid bouquets before the statues of the great leaders before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Plastic Tube in Wide Use
articles.content:
Plastic Tube in Wide Use
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- It is gaining momentum in the DPRK to frame greenhouses with plastic tubes.
					 In recent months alone, plastic-tube greenhouses made their appearance at factories and co-op farms in Maengsan, Onchon and other counties.
					
					 Those greenhouses have proved easy in building and economic.
					
					 The plastic-tube greenhouse is three times longer than greenhouse with steel frame in durability.
					
					 Plastic tubes are being produced by the Songyong Building Materials Factory in Rangnang District, Pyongyang.
					
					 According to Manager Choe Nam Chol, the factory has excellent production processes for manufacturing plastic tubes of different sizes, colored plate roofing and plastic sheet.
					
					 The demand for plastic tube is expected to be steadily increased, he said.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Three Revolutions-Ideological, Technical and Cultural
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Three Revolutions-Ideological, Technical and Cultural
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- It is the general line of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) for the socialist construction to thoroughly carry out the three revolutions-ideological, technical and cultural, while strengthening the people's power and steadily enhancing its function and role, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article. 
					 The WPK's general line is the most important strategic line defining the general orientation of the revolutionary struggle and construction, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung originally clarified the appearance of socialist society and lawful course of its construction and clearly indicated the revolutionary principle and ways for the socialist construction long ago. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed in depth on a new higher stage the President's theory of the socialist construction. 
					
					 He scientifically clarified the historical lesson drawn from the collapse of socialism in different countries and clearly laid down the general line of the WPK for the socialist construction. 
					
					 His ideas and theories became a beacon of the times as they instilled confidence in socialism into the Korean people and all other progressives of the world and dealt heavy blows at the reactionaries of history opposed to socialism. 
					
					 The feats the great leaders performed by clarifying new aspects of the socialist revolutionary theories in the present times and putting them into practice are the great historical ones for accomplishing the popular masses' cause of independence and the cause of socialism. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will thoroughly carry out the general line of the WPK for the socialist construction and accomplish the cause of socialism despite any difficulty and stern ordeal, notes the article.

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Form New Cold War Landscape Disclosed
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Form New Cold War Landscape Disclosed
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. decided with Japan to set up a new military coordinating mechanism for administering collective counteraction of the U.S. forces and the Japan "Self-Defence Forces" not only in "emergencies" but in peace time and it officially adopted "4D operational plan" with the south Korean authorities as part of the scenario to tighten military nexus with allies.
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Friday says: Through these actions the U.S. laid a solid groundwork for tightening the military alliance with Japan and south Korea and justifying arms buildup in Northeast Asia and the triangular military alliance involving the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					
					 The DPRK's "ballistic missile launch" touted by the U.S. and Japan is the first target of the counteraction of the new military coordinating body while China and Russia are the second and third targets, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 No one in the world would believe that the U.S. early warning satellites and high altitude unmanned reconnaissance planes with the mission of guaranteeing the implementation of the "4D operational plan" will only monitor the military movements of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are hell-bent on arms buildup, prompted by their strategic scenario to hold an unchallenged military edge over other countries in the region.
					
					 The new Cold War landscape being formed by the U.S. is primarily targeted against the DPRK. Now that this has been confirmed, the DPRK will not just remain an on-looker to it.
					
					 During the Cold War in the latter half of the 20th century the U.S. failed to bring down the DPRK. It is sadly mistaken if it thinks it can stifle the DPRK in the new Cold War in the 21st century.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Denounced 
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Days ago, the south Korean authorities together with the hostile forces such as the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries tried to cook up a "resolution on human rights issue in north Korea" slandering the DPRK at the Third Committee of the UN General Assembly. 
					 The authorities, on the other hand, let loose vicious words to kick up confrontation racket against the DPRK at the talks with the "special envoy for the human rights issue in north Korea" of the U.S. Department of State who visited south Korea. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The south Korean authorities' anti-DPRK "human rights" racket is a root cause of pushing the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe as it is a blatant challenge to the dignity and social system of the DPRK and a harsh political provocation. 
					
					 Their racket is the revelation of their traitorous ambition for confrontation of social systems. 
					
					 They are strengthening cooperation with outside forces while vociferating about "human rights issue in north Korea". The aim is at realizing the ambition for "unification under liberal democracy". 
					
					 Their evermore escalating "human rights" campaign against the DPRK with the U.S. and other hostile forces is to tarnish the prestige of the DPRK and realize international pressure on it and finally bring down its dignified social system. 
					
					 Very ridiculous is the sinister intention of the south Korean authorities to achieve "unification of social systems" at any cost by taking advantage of the U.S. anti-DPRK "human rights" racket. And it is a daydream which can never be realized. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop at once their useless confrontation campaign after thinking twice about the grave consequences to be entailed by their anti-DPRK "human rights" racket.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Working Hard to Write off Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Working Hard to Write off Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The Ulsan Headquarters of the Movement for Reunified Korean Nation held a press conference in Ulsan on Nov. 18 denouncing Japan's shameless demand for the removal of a statue of a girl laying bare the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean internet newspaper "Thongil News".
					 The speakers at the press conference recalled that the Japanese government set the removal of the statue in Ulsan as a precondition for settling the sexual slavery issue, far from making an apology and reflection on its past crimes at the recent talks with the south Korean authorities.
					
					 They demanded the Japanese government make sincere apology and state reparation for the crimes related to the sexual slavery.
					
					 A Wednesday rally for settling the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army took place outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on the same day.

articles.title: Ruling Party's Move to Railroad "Bill on Terrorism" Opposed by S. Korean Newspaper
articles.content:
Ruling Party's Move to Railroad "Bill on Terrorism" Opposed by S. Korean Newspaper
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on Nov. 19 editorially opposed the "Saenuri Party's" move to railroad the "bill on terrorism" through the "National Assembly.".
					 The editorial slammed the "Saenuri Party" for making desperate efforts to railroad the above-said bill through the "NA" under the pretext of a terrorist case that occurred abroad.
					
					 The bill has been criticized since it was proposed in 2001 as it called for giving the Intelligence Service the mandate to spearhead the anti-terror moves, the editorial said, and continued:
					
					 The Intelligence Service should never be given the wing of anti-terror law as it has been engrossed in illegal political interference including the red herring operation before election and the disclosure of the minutes of the north-south summit.
					
					 The representative of "Saenuri Party" shortly ago termed the all-out people's action a "terror against government power".
					
					 Once the bill passes, the authorities will quench any voice and act critical of the "government" as terrorist ones.
					
					  The "Saenuri Party"-proposed "bill on terrorism" is designed to lay a foundation for a horror politics, the editorial said, contending that the passage of bill should never be allowed as it may throw society into the constant state of martial law.

articles.title: Maltreatment of Children Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Maltreatment of Children Unabated in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Cases of maltreatment of children have increased 77 percent over the recent four years, according to Yonhap News of south Korea on Nov. 18.
					 Against this backdrop there occurred another violent case in the "Children's House" in Kimpho City, Kyonggi Province on November 13.
					
					 An employee of the house harshly treated a one-year old child for the reason that the child continued crying.
					
					 Its employees were also reported to have tied children to chairs and prevented them from sleeping.
					
					 Children there suffer from fear and horror such as repressing even urine for fear of extreme violence.
					
					 South Korean children wither away since their birth amid wide-spread maltreatment which has become prevalent in society under the authorities' unpopular rule.

articles.title: World Peace Council President Urges U.S. to Show Sincere Stand on DPRK's Proposal for Peace Treaty
articles.content:
World Peace Council President Urges U.S. to Show Sincere Stand on DPRK's Proposal for Peace Treaty
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Socorro Gomes, president of the World Peace Council, issued a statement on Nov. 13 supporting the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty.
					 The state of war persists on the Korean Peninsula even in the new century which is attributable to the U.S. anachronistic and reactionary acts, he said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. purpose is to put south Korea, its lackey, under its military control through frequent military exercises against the DPRK and further strengthen its domination over the region at the same time.
					
					 The Korean people have repeatedly clarified the stand to achieve peaceful reunification free from foreign interference but it has not yet been realized due to the U.S. interference and the anti-reunification acts of the successive south Korean chief executives who followed the U.S.
					
					 In order to prevent a war on the peninsula it is necessary for the DPRK and the U.S. to scrap the Armistice Agreement and conclude a new peace treaty to create lasting peace.
					
					 The U.S. has to discard its anachronistic hostile policy and accept the just demand of the DPRK on concluding peace treaty.
					
					 If it boldly makes a switchover in its policy, it can hold constructive dialogue with the DPRK.
					
					 He urged the U.S. to approach with sincerity the DPRK's proposal for peace treaty and stop interfering in the peninsula.

articles.title: Latin American Parliament Supports DPRK's Proposal for Peace Treaty
articles.content:
Latin American Parliament Supports DPRK's Proposal for Peace Treaty
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The Latin American Parliament posted an article supporting the DPRK government's proposal for peace treaty on its Internet website on Nov. 12.
					 The article said the parliament extends solidarity to the DPRK keeping to its path despite the U.S. constant threats.
					
					 At the 70th UN General Assembly the DPRK clarified once again its fair and above-board stand to replace the 1953 Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty to meet an urgent need to remove the danger of the outbreak of a war and create the atmosphere of lasting peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is trying to make the public convince that the DPRK is posing threat to the world peace and security but it is just a pretext it cooked up to bring more of its forces to the peninsula and its vicinity.
					
					 The DPRK maintains the conclusion of the peace treaty to create a peaceful environment for building a thriving socialist nation and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 But the U.S. is rendering the situation on the peninsula tense while interrupting in every way the DPRK's sincere efforts.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Support DPRK's Proposal for Peace Treaty
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Support DPRK's Proposal for Peace Treaty
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement on Nov. 14 denounced the U.S. for turning down the DPRK's proposal for a peace treaty.
					 The U.S. unwarranted demand that there has to be progress in the denuclearization before the conclusion of the treaty can never be accepted, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. far-fetched assertion that the DPRK has to dismantle nuclear weapons first is aimed to shun the conclusion of the treaty.
					
					 The nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula is the product of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and it spawned as the U.S. has threatened the DPRK with nuclear weapons which it brought to south Korea in wanton violation of the Armistice Agreement.
					
					 All problems can be settled only when the U.S. concludes a peace treaty and withdraws its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The conclusion of a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. is a key to durable peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The conclusion also benefits the U.S. for its security.
					
					 The U.S. has to accept the DPRK's proposal. 
					
					 Its conclusion will pave the way for realizing the denuclearization of the peninsula, for withdrawing the U.S. forces and nuclear weapons from south Korea and realizing independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 We support the DPRK's stand.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Warn U.S. against Re-listing DPRK as "Sponsor of Terrorism"
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Warn U.S. against Re-listing DPRK as "Sponsor of Terrorism"
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement on Nov. 12 censured the conservative forces of the U.S. for raising the issue of re-listing the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism".
					 Even though the DPRK has nothing to do with terrorist issue, the conservative forces seek to paint the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism," the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It is not because they have any legal ground but it just stemmed from their inveterate repugnancy to the DPRK and hostile intention. 
					
					 The U.S. persistent hostile policy toward the DPRK will further bolster the latter's nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The DPRK is a peace-loving country standing against terrorism and posing no threat to anyone.
					
					 The re-listing of the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism" will be a serious provocation.
					
					 The U.S. government's list of "sponsors of terrorism" is a criminal document pursuing the purpose of making independent states unstable and therefore, it has to be abolished.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un participa en manejo de prueba de nuevo tren electrico subterraneo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un participa en manejo de prueba de nuevo tren electrico subterraneo
Pyongyang, 20 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, participo en el manejo de prueba de nuevo tren electrico subterraneo, fabricado nuevamente.
					A las 22:30 del 19 de noviembre, el Mariscal salio a la Estacion Subterranea Kaeson donde se realiza la prueba del tren electrico subterraneo.
					
					Al recorrer la Estacion dijo que hoy anora mas que otros dias al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, y anadio que el Metro de Pyongyang, impregnado del ardiente amor del Presidente y el Dirigente quienes se esforzaron durante toda su vida por ofrecer al pueblo las condiciones mas ricas y cultas, es la riqueza preciosa de la nacion y la creacion monumental de amor al pueblo que se transmitira de generacion en generacion.
					
					Subrayo que los grandes Lideres estarian muy alegres al ver el tren electrico subterraneo, fabricado por nuestros obreros, cientificos y tecnicos, que corre en el Metro de Pyongyang.
					
					Viajo de ida a vuelta en el tren el tramo de las Estaciones Subterraneas Kaeson, Thong-il, Sung-ri, Ponghwa y Yonggwang, enterandose en detalles del proceso de la prueba del tren.
					
					Es muy buena la capacidad del tren, destaco el Mariscal y anadio que la velocidad y el freno son perfectos.
					
					Es muy gallardo el aspecto del tren electrico y dan sensaciones modernas los implementos del tren e instalaciones informaticas de operacion, senalo y subrayo que los habitantes se alegraran mucho si utilizan el tren fabricado con nuestra fuerza, tecnologia y manos.
					
					Destaco que a traves de la prueba exitosa del tren electrico subterraneo, nuestros inteligentes obreros, cientificos y tecnicos de Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il, infinitamente fieles al partido, demostraron no con la palabra sino con la practica lo que deben eliminar la palabra "enfermedad de importacion" y anadio que esto le dio la mas gran fuerza.
					
					El Mariscal se fotografio junto con los funcionarios, cientificos y tecnicos del Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae y la rama correspondiente, quienes participaron en la prueba del tren electrico subterraneo.
					
					Ese dia, el Mariscal presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan en el acondicionamiento del Metro Subterraneo de Pyongyang conforme a la vista de un Estado civilizado socialista y la mejora de la informatizacion y la modernizacion de la administracion del metro.
					
					Le acompanaron Pak Pong Ju, Kim Yang Gon, O Su Yong, Jo Yong Won y Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Secretariado de CRPP envia aviso a Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de
articles.content:
Secretariado de CRPP envia aviso a Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 20 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) envio el dia 20 por via Phanmunjom un aviso al Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea. 
					El aviso propone sostener el 26 del mes en curso en el Pabellon Thong-il de la parte Norte de Phanmunjom el contacto de trabajo para las conversaciones de autoridades Norte-Sur.

articles.title: Levantadas en Academia Militar Politica Kim Il Sung estatuas de bronce de Lideres coreanos
articles.content:
Levantadas en Academia Militar Politica Kim Il Sung estatuas de bronce de Lideres coreanos
Pyongyang, 20 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Fueron erguidas en la Academia Militar Politica Kim Il Sung las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 20 en el terreno la ceremonia de descubrimiento.
					
					Estuvieron presentes Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil y otros miembros de mando del EPC, los funcionarios, profesores, empleados, cadetes de la academia, los funcionarios de las academias militares a todos los niveles, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y otros.
					
					Los cuadros del ejercito y los funcionarios de la academia descubrieron las estatuas de bronce de los Lideres coreanos.
					
					Fue depositado ante las estatuas de bronce un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Y fueron depositados un cesto de flores en nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar, del PTC y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y los otros en nombre de la Academia Militar Politica Kim Il Sung, la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el Estado Mayor General y las unidades y academias militares a todos los niveles, del EPC, varias unidades y las facultades, catedras y otros de la academia.
					
					Todos los participantes rindieron homenaje al Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					El ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Pak Yong Sik, en el discurso de ceremonia, exhorto a los profesores, empleados y cadetes de la academia y a todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC a enaltecer para siempre al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il como eternos Lideres del PTC y la revolucion y a defender y glorificar de generacion en generacion las hazanas de los grandes Lideres acumuladas en el sector de la educacion militar.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, los participantes escucharon la explicacion y recorrieron las estatuas de bronce.

articles.title: Inaugurada IV conferencia nacional de vanguardias de Tres Revoluciones
articles.content:
Inaugurada IV conferencia nacional de vanguardias de Tres Revoluciones
Pyongyang, 20 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 20 en esta capital la IV Conferencia Nacional de Vanguardias del Movimiento por la Obtencion de la Bandera Roja de las Tres Revoluciones.
					El foro hara balance de los exitos y experiencias alcanzados en el Movimiento por la Obtencion de la Bandera Roja de las Tres Revoluciones y discutira las tareas y remedios para profundizar y llevar a la etapa mas alta este movimiento en todos los dominios y las unidades.
					
					Estuvieron presentes alli Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, los secretarios jefes de los comites provinciales del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los abanderados de las unidades quienes obtuvieron la Bandera Roja de las Tres Revoluciones, benemeritos de la epoca del Songun y los funcionarios de las ramas correspondientes.
					
					Participaron en calidad de observador los funcionarios de los organos, fabricas, empresas, granjas y otras unidades que obtuvieron la Bandera Roja de las Tres Revoluciones y ejemplares abanderados de las Tres Revoluciones en la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, dio lectura al mensaje del Mariscal Kim Jong Un intitulado "Produzcamos cambios radicales en el Movimiento por la Bandera Roja de las Tres Revoluciones segun las exigencias de la revolucion en desarrollo", enviado a los participantes en la presente conferencia.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam.
					
					Durante los 40 anos pasados el Movimiento por la Obtencion de Bandera Roja de las Tres Revoluciones, que ha venido heredando con exito la historia y la tradicion del autoctono movimiento masivo, impulso con vigor la revolucion y la construccion demostrando sin reservas su atraccion y vitalidad bajo la guia de los grandes Hombres sin par del monte Paektu, dijo y continuo: 
					
					En todos los motivos trascendentales de la revolucion, el Presidente Kim Il Sung dio iniciativa a los movimientos masivos inclusive la Campana de Movilizacion Ideologica General para la Construccion del Estado y el Movimiento Chollima, y condujo siempre a la victoria la revolucion y la construccion movilizando el indoblegable poderio espiritual e inagotables fuerzas creadoras del pueblo coreano.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien encarno completamente el modo directivo del movimiento masivo del Presidente, tomo en noviembre del 64 (1975) de la Era Juche la iniciativa de desarrollar la campana masiva para obtener la Bandera Roja de las Tres Revoluciones e hizo que los obreros de Komdok y los trabajadores agricolas de la comuna de Chongsan levantaran la primera antorcha.
					
					El Dirigente hizo realizar en noviembre de 1986 la primera Conferencia de los Vanguardias del Movimiento por la Obtencion de la Bandera Roja de las Tres Revoluciones, ocasion en la cual envio a los participantes un mensaje "Despleguemos con mayor energia el movimiento por la obtencion de la bandera roja de las tres revoluciones", aclarando asi el rumbo y metodos para desarrollar este movimiento de manera amplia, profunda y energica conforme a la demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo.
					
					Las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente acumuladas en la historia de ese movimiento se llevan adelante con exito hoy por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					El Mariscal prepara la nueva edicion del movimiento en cuestion tomando como eterno poste de senal por la victoria final de la Revolucion Coreana la linea de las Tres Revoluciones: la ideologia, la tecnica y la cultura.
					
					Defender, mantener y llevar adelante las indelebles hazanas de la direccion de los grandes Lideres acumuladas en la historia de autoctono movimiento masivo, es la linea vital a ser mantenida invariablemente en el Movimiento por la Obtencion de la Bandera Roja de las Tres Revoluciones.
					
					Todos los dominios y todas las unidades deben tomar por guias programaticas los legados del Presidente y el Dirigente y convertir dicho movimiento en el trabajo para materializar correctamente los legados y el deseo de los grandes Lideres.
					
					Todas las organizaciones y funcionarios del partido y los abanderados de las Tres Revoluciones deben registrar el cambio decisivo en este movimiento en pleno acato al mensaje historico del Mariscal,.innovar y avanzar sin cesar para anticipar la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero y la causa revoluciona del Juche.
					
					En el foro hubo intervenciones.
					
					La Conferencia continua.
